评论详情: Nice fit, color and price!
I like this shirt. Fits well.

I wore it as a casual dressy top.  Black and wore white pants.  Liked how it fit in the chest and lean in middle.  Asymmetric hem so stylish.  I pulled the point down as low as it can go for style.  I’m a senior so don’t wear it showing abs.  Medium fit me tight at waist and fitted chest, and arms.  The seam just hugs. I have ordered other colors now.  5’5”, 135.  I wore it with blue jeans now, with cute animal print jacket.  I won’t wear it for work out, but casual.  5 stars,
It’s okay nothing to get too excited about. Nothing overly flattering or out of the norm here. Your usual Amazon quality.

I love this top. It feels more luxuriously soft than the price reflects. It's a nice thickness for those transitional seasonal days w 60ish degree days when you aren't sure what to wear. Great for exercise, athleisure or even a pj top. I am watching for these to go on sale again to buy more colors!
Should have some spandex content. Lost shape after 1 wear.
Fits perfectly and very comfortable.

评论概述: Cute, well-made but not for long torso
评论详情: Cute shirt. Love the color and style and I wanted it to fit. I am 5' 5" but have a long torso and it came up too high to be able to move around comfortably in.

评论概述: Very cute top.  True to size
评论详情: It’s a perfect fit
Great fit
a little thinner material that I expected, but nie fit.
no complaints
Fits perfect! So comfortable. I need one in every color
To many wrinkles even after washing
This shirt has ok material but it wasn't very breathable fabric. It also runs very small. I also wasn't a fan of how it fit, kinda an award fit.

评论概述: I sized up and glad I did
评论详情: I sized up for a more relaxed/comfortable fit and I’m glad I did. The sleeves are long on me and I’m okay with that. Lightweight fabric, perfect for spring/summer. I really like the neckline and asymmetric hemline. The style is versatile as activewear, lounge, athleisure, casual outfits. Happy with the quality. I like this shirt a lot; bought multiple colors.
The fit & color
After one wash had pulling already threw it in donation bag!
Nice material and fit.

Love this. Great to work out in, play pickleball or just go out casually in. Particularly like that the knot is on the side. Many others are in the front and makes me look heavy. Will probably buy in another color or 2.
The fabric and the comfort. Great for travel too.
The color is great, turquoise. Washable and did not shrink. Fits my small body perfectly. Thank you!
The fabric content is wrong for a yoga top.. It sticks to the leggings!  But the top is really cute.
Love the fit, the look, the color, just everything about this top!
Don’t buy it
Fabric is cheap. Detail on neckline gets messed up due to cheap fabric. If not for this I would've loved this top.

评论概述: A_dark blue is not quite as vibrant a blue as pictured. A little muted, but still a pleasing blue.
评论详情: I have this Pinspark women’s  long sleeve v neck twist front top in the A_dark blue color, size Medium. I have a 36b bra size and didn’t want it tight in the chest and saw that the model is wearing a size small and has a bust of 31.5 inches. I am glad I got the size medium as it fits me nicely, like the model. I think a size small would be too snug in the chest and elsewhere. The color blue is not an electric vibrant blue as shown in the photos, but still a nice blue,  just a little muted. The twist takes a little getting used to, I don’t have other clothes with twists. This twist is a bit bulky but not bad. The v neck is a nice detail without being too deep a v. I like the length of this in back. It is made of thin lightweight, soft stretchy fabric. This top is good with high waisted yoga pants or other high waisted bottoms.

So, keep in mind that this is a workout top, which means that it is going to be smaller than what you are used to.  The fabric is nice and wicking. The wine-red color is like a heather maroon, which I like. When I chose it, I didn't realize how high the shirt sits on the waist and shows off my midriff.

评论概述: Belly will show if you have a long torso
评论详情: Pinspark Womens Long Sleeve Workout Top: Pros: + nice color, as shown + appears to be sewn well + comfortable + arrived quickly + neckline lays nicely  Cons: - not long enough to fully cover my torso (might look better with high rise bottoms) - could not adjust the fabric twist in a way to keep stitching hidden (see photo of twist)  For fitting reference: I ordered a size small and I am 5’4”, 32B cup (there was extra room across the bust to accommodate a size or maybe 2 larger. The shoulder width was accurate per the chart, so I expected that part to be a bit large on me. The twist part actually made the waist fit more snug than I expected; not uncomfortable, but probably would have draped nicer if I were an inch or two skinnier. Lower belly is up to 31” at widest measurement.

This is either meant to be a slim fit or it runs small. I have my typical medium and it has a slim fit feel and I wish I sized up. I’m 5’ 4”, 145lb, 34DD. I really love the twisted side style that is abstract, simple and creative. It feels a bit awkward at my waist, but I think I can make it work with high-waisted pants. This is not a shirt I would use for working out or being athletic. The high twist at the waist and cut of this shirt makes it uncomfortable to move around in and shows my belly if I even slightly raise my arms. Plus, the fabric is a soft, cotton-feel, not like your typical athletic fabric. So, it makes a good casual shirt.

评论概述: Cute, but not for every body type…
评论详情: I think this top would have fit better in the midsection and looked better lengthwise if I ordered a medium, but been too loose in the chest and arms. The color is perfect, and all the colors look great… but it’s just not flattering for every body type. It accentuates my tiny belly which made me very self conscious. And there is a seam on the side with the bunched up fabric, which makes sense for production, but looks kid of awkward when you’re wearing it. The price isn’t bad if you can get past that and have the right body type for this shirt.

This is a "fine" shirt. Nothing remarkable. Maybe the twist sits a little higher than I would do it myself.  It fits fine. Fabric is thin, but ok for workout, although it does really fit to the body. I don't do yoga, but I do weight train and honestly, I don't think i would wear this to the gym, it shows too much belly for my comfortability level.  Color is ok, not quite as vibrant as the photo. I think it would be ok as a casual day running errands shirt.

评论概述: I really wanted to love this top
评论详情: I wish I could say that I loved this top but unfortunately it's way too small. I typically wear an XL or a 2XL depending on the material and style of the top (I prefer things to be lose or comfortably fit) and the shirt was more like a medium. The fabric feels great and the design in the front is super cute but even with the stretchy material, there's no way I could make this work. Love the color, it's just too bad it's way too small.

评论概述: This is really short in the front
评论详情: I thought this was a really cute top and was looking forward to wearing it.  I love the fit and think that it is very flattering.  However, it is very short on me and I'm a short person.  I like the fabric and I like the color more than I thought I would. It will be ok with my high waisted yoga pants but I don't think that I'll feel very confident wearing it with jeans.  I might order again but I would order one size up next time.

I ordered a medium and it fits good, just wish it was a tad longer at the waist.  The knot brings the top above my waist and shows skin.  For young people, that’s great however as I get older, I would prefer to cover my belly.  When stretching etc. it comes up higher.  Love the material and color!

评论概述: Think of it like a crop top
评论详情: Great moisture-wicking fabric, fits true to size, washes up nicely. The little knot at the front hip is a cute detail, but it makes this shirt almost like a crop top. Definitely pair with high-waisted leggings or else just expect some of your stomach to be visible. Love the turquoise color!

If you are fit with great abs this is your shirt. I am not. It is a bit too snug in the abdomen and lower ribs. The sleeve length is great. I like the fabric thickness for stretching and moving. I like the design.

I wanted to love this shirt, but it is much tighter around my hip area than I would have liked.  I’m athletic build and have curves.  Even buying up a size was not lose enough.  Seems well made and is a nice feeling material.

评论概述: Nice color, fit a little off
评论详情: This shirt is a great style, but the fit is a little off. I don't mean the size is off, that's fine. When I put it on, it constantly feels like it's pulling off to the side or not straight and I find myself pulling at the hem thinking it's twisting at the waist. I don't believe it's due to the design as I have other shirts that have a similar feature that sit nicely. The color of the shirt is very nice and vivid and the material feels like a thin cotton. I'm not sure I would order this again only because I don't like constantly checking to ensure it's not twisting or riding up.
This is a great value  and feels great according to my wife.

评论概述: Flattering! Good casual wear, not really an athletic material.
评论详情: I absolutely love the style of this shirt, but I don’t consider it an exercise/workout shirt. The fabric is polyester, rayon, spandex and it’s super soft, but it doesn’t feel like athletic material. This is a shirt I will wear to work or with jeans and some cute shoes for casual wear. I may pair it with joggers too, but not to work out in. The quality of the shirt is very good and the fit is spot on (per their size chart, I sized up from my typical US size). Sleeve length is on the longer side and works great for me (5’8”), but may fit too long on a petite woman. Washing instructions are to machine wash, air dry. In the category of a long sleeve tee, this is one my favorites this season because the style is very flattering on its own and it layers well under sweaters and jackets too.

The fabric is a good quality, soft and light. Color is accurate to photo. The fit of this is really awkward. The cinched part at the bottom does not look like the photo and instead comes up another 3 inches from the rest of the shirt. Maybe it would have looked better if I sized up but I doubt it. The bottom hem is just odd. Not for me.
I love the fit of this top. The material is soft and comfortable and it fits as expected. The quality is great and I wear it for yoga, it’s easy to move around in.

Like most white workout tops this one is pretty sheer.  Also, the sleeves hit almost two inches above my wrist.  I am tall so this is to be expected.  Overall, the stitching seems nicely done, it looks as expected and it is comfortable.  I just wish the white wasn’t so sheer.

This is a very comfortable workout or exercise shirt.  Soft material!  Washes well!  No shrinkage.  I like the design of this shirt.  Very stylish and different from my other workout shirts!  Well-made!  Nice fit!  I like wearing this shirt for my outdoor exercise.  Let’s my skin breath.  The long sleeves shade my arms from the harmful sun’s uv rays.  Happy to have this shirt!

This workout top fits just as shown and is tts. The sleeves are long enough to cover my wrists - something I like once the weather gets cold. The shoulders allow me to move comfortably. The back hem does not cover the rear, which is as shown. The front twist is super cute, but I discovered it leaves me feeling chilly on a cold day. Once I start working out and moving, it's ok. But not for wearing around the house or to run errands, for the cold factor.  The material is a smooth poly blend, like many other athletic shirts. It breathes and dries quickly.  Overall I like this shirt, and I would get it again.

Firstly, the blue is such a beautiful shade of baby blue/turquoise! Bright and vibrant! Shirt has a nice stretch to it, fits perfectly an is so soft and comfortable! Love the twist on the side!! I don’t use it for workout wear, but have paired it with some black leggings , also with white jeans, an it worked so well with both!

This shirt is...ok. I may like it more after washing. For the first wearing, I will say I am not a great fan of the texture. The fit is generous across the bust and a tad tighter than I like on the sleeves.

评论概述: Super soft and great for working out
评论详情: Wonderful shirt to work out.  I love the design where it gathers on the one side. I think it gives me a slimmer look. It’s lightweight and I love the v neck, makes it more attractive and feminine to me, which I admire. I would love to get more colors to have during the fall and winter months. I highly recommend this cute top.
I have had this top for a few months now and it has kept up well and it's very cute!

This shirt is great for outdoor workouts, running or casual wear! I love it. I got the wine red color, and the twisted bottom is such a playful touch that makes this shirt a bit more upscale looking. It is thin and breathable, great for when you start sweating a little. Would definitely recommend!

评论概述: Great if you're looking for a snug fit
评论详情: Details: I'm 5'4", 160 lbs and bought a large.  This is a soft, pretty shirt. I bought it for yoga. It’s appropriate for that, but I was hoping for something a little longer. It’s fairly short and is going to be more revealing of problem areas than I strictly love. That being said, there’s nothing wrong with this shirt – it’s exactly as advertised.
Love this workout top! The twist gives it a stylish and flattering look. I would definitely recommend.

评论概述: Great shirt for hiking or yoga!
评论详情: This is a very nice, flattering shirt for Fall hiking or Fall/winter yoga classes.  The material is nice and soft and drapes well on the body.  It's also cool enough so you do not overheat when working out, but gives you more protection than a short sleeve shirt in cool weather.

It is a bit see through, but it has a cute scrunch on the side. The long sleeve provides nice coverage. A true clean white that can be worn for a down day, cleaning day or yoga class. Very comfortable!
This top is very pretty and nicely made. It’s not heavy material, just the right weight BUT it runs small. I would order up at least 1 size.
flattering and fits well. would buy again
